scripts.import-mongo: npm run import-config && npm run import-domain && npm run import-pool
scripts.export-mongo: npm run export-config && npm run export-domain && npm run export-pool
scripts.export-config: mkdir -p data; mongoexport --db SOVRIN_TESTNET --collection txs-config | head -300 > data/config.txs
scripts.export-domain: mkdir -p data; mongoexport --db SOVRIN_TESTNET --collection txs-domain | head -300 > data/domain.txs
scripts.export-pool: mkdir -p data; mongoexport --db SOVRIN_TESTNET --collection txs-pool   | head -300 > data/pool.txs
